TITLE: BOBBY'S BODY

CAMPAIGN: PERSONAL PROJECT

THE PROJECT

This was an app I built for my final year project in college. Its aim was to teach kids about some of the most important systems of the human body. It was a year long project which featured a range of different phases consisting of things such as idea generation, inspiration, design work and dev work. I drew colorful illustrations of the different systems after observing other pieces of work and then preceded to build the app. The logic was developed in ActionScript 3 and the app itself was packaged with Adobe Air. I'm currently in the process of updating the app with refined animations and a conversion from ActionScript 3 to JS. It can definitely be improved and I think now is an ideal time with all that I've learned over the past couple of years.
To gain a good understanding of the process I've linked my blog in the resource section below. This was updated regularly during the project and should hopefully give you an insight into the thinking behind some of my decisions. Lastly, just to note the blog hasn't been updated in nearly 3 years so I've come a long way since then. Some of the decisions I made back then I might not make today but that is the beauty of learning!

INVOLVEMENT

  • ADOBE ANIMATE (ADOBE FLASH AT THE TIME)
  • ACTIONSCRIPT 3
  • JAVASCRIPT
  • PHOTOSHOP
  • ILLUSTRATOR
